alert.note: Alert for Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 16 at 3:31PM EDT by NWS Melbourne
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Lucie and central Martin Counties through 400 PM EDT... At 331 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Palm City, moving north at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Port Saint Lucie, Stuart, Palm City, Jensen Beach, and Sewall`s Point. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Martin; Coastal St. Lucie; Inland Martin; Inland St. Lucie
